name: Game in Which You Are a Cat Tenderly Annoying Your Owner by Rearranging Their Sock Drawer
name_original: Game in Which You Are a Cat Tenderly Annoying Your Owner by Rearranging Their Sock Drawer
description:
This is a roleplaying game where you pretend to be a cat tenderly annoying your owner/ownee by rearranging their sock drawer. Click your mouse to do that thing. Once you've saved up enough points, you can make your cat wear a top hat or drink coffee or summon dark forces or whatever.

All assets and programming by Luciella Elisabeth Scarlett. I used the following software: Krita (illustration), Spine (2D animation), Unity (game engine) and Visual Studio (programming).
